name: Gotta Go Hamster
description:
In this cheerful game you will run till you reach the party at the top of the mountain. You will have fun talking and runing crazy fast around the island.

Current version: BETA 0.8 

---------- MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS------------

CPU--> i3 7th gen / ryzen 3 1200 || GPU--> 1060 movile 3gb vram / radeon rx 570 8gb vram  ||  RAM--> 8gb

Up to day GPU drivers. Suport for vulkan

--------- RECOMENDED REQUIREMENTS----------

CPU--> i5 7th gen / ryzen 5 1200  ||  GPU--> 1060 6gb vram / radeon rx 580 8gb vram  ||  RAM--> 16gb

Up to day GPU drivers. Suport for vulkan

CONTROLS

MOVEWASD/ ARROWSRIGHT JOYSTICKINTERACTEB/X (XBOX CONTROLLER)JUMP
SPACEBARA (XBOX CONTROLLER)RUNSHIFTRIGHT TRIGGERPAUSEPstart
